channel.title: What's the source of "Posture" synth?
channel.description:
This synth is part of the original sounds of Auxy. I am trying to emulate it in hardware synth using oscillators and all the arsenal of knobs but would need some clues about its design or what's the source of it if sampled.
Any theories?

item.title: What's the source of "Posture" synth?
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Start with a synth brass tutorial online…

Beyond that, it’s seemingly multi-voiced with a fair amount of detune spread across the voices

https://www.youtube.com/embed/edkTRDz4sEs

Another point of reference might be the opening synth sound from Yazoo’s Don’t Go ('80s synth-pop track)

https://www.youtube.com/embed/LJBY9v1c8PA

Read full topic

item.title: What's the source of "Posture" synth?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
A sawtooth, some noise, and a LPF will get you pretty close.

Read full topic
